bind.jr:constraintMsg: Only enter the digits of the respondent's phone number.
Only enter the digits of the respondent's phone number.
The number of weeks with no potable water cannot be smaller than the number of weeks with no water.
Please enter a number between 0 and 30 days.
There can't be more computers for students than there are computers total.
There can't be more computers with internet than there are computers total.
There can't be more qualified teachers than the total number of teachers.
There can't be more qualified teachers than the total number of teachers.
The number of days the school was closed do to understaffing cannot be more than the number of days the school was understaffed.
The number of teachers that taught on the last full day of school cannot exceed the total number of teachers at the school.

item.label: Sufficient (every student has at least 1 pen-pencil)

Severely insufficient (more than 25% of students do not have a pen-pencil) .
